title: ranked system
body:
just quickly a lot of players are having the same issues and i am honestly so fed up with this ranked system
i have been on winning sprees from 4 to 8 matches and right after all those matches there is alkways a couple of matches that i get ranked with players with lower elo so i dont know why that happoens like i am so mad that my last 3 games i have been ranked with people that genuanly feed and dont care about it
why does the rank system rank me with trash players that expect me to carry them... i am genuanly upset bc this is so stupid

replies.body: Why should other people's "bad days" affect your rank?

25% of guaranteed losing
25% of guaranteed winning
50% of win or lose

You can get a 60% win rate fairly consistently if you play consistently well.

the only way we will get something out of riot with this is if we continue to complain about it.

In every "can you give us some feed back" i have done i've written about this.
